home.title: JECH Programming Language
home.subtitle: Learn how programming languages work under the hood
home.description: JECH is a language built from scratch to teach you exactly how Python, JavaScript, and PHP work - in a clear, documented, and accessible way.

educational.title: Educational
educational.description: Learn the fundamental concepts of compilers and interpreters

transparent.title: Transparent
transparent.description: See every step: tokenizer, parser, AST, bytecode, and VM

practical.title: Practical
practical.description: Run real code with variables, arrays, and conditionals
